name: OABSmartWidget
summary: A Drag And Drop library for iOS (min iOS 8).
description:
A Drag And Drop library for iOS (min iOS 8).
This library is based on draggable collection view made by Luke Scott (https://github.com/lukescott/DraggableCollectionView).
The purpose is to give a base implementation for draggable cells to be reused in other projects.
